languages.text: {n}Винтерскейл изучающе смотрит на тощего ксеноса, словно прикидывая, как сподручнее сломать ему хребет.{/n} "И теперь нелюди вернулись сюда, чтобы стать мясом на потеху мне. Занятно".

traits.locale_text: {n}Винтерскейл изучающе смотрит на тощего ксеноса, словно прикидывая, как сподручнее сломать ему хребет.{/n} "И теперь нелюди вернулись сюда, чтобы стать мясом на потеху мне. Занятно".
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: {n}Winterscale examines him as if thinking of the most efficient way to snap his spine.{/n} "And now the beasts have returned to become meat for my amusement. Glorious."
languages.original_text: {n}Винтерскейл изучающе смотрит на тощего ксеноса, словно прикидывая, как сподручнее сломать ему хребет.{/n} "И теперь нелюди вернулись сюда, чтобы стать мясом на потеху мне. Занятно".

traits.locale_text: {n}Winterscale scrutinizes the skinny xenos as if thinking of a way to snap his spine more efficiently.{/n} "And now the abhumans come back here just to become a fodder for my entertainment. How amusing."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

traits.locale_text: {n}Winterscale scrutinizes the skinny xenos as if thinking of a way to snap his spine more efficiently.{/n} "And now the abhumans come back here just to become a fodder for my entertainment. How amusing."

traits.locale_text: {n}Winterscale examines him as if thinking of the most efficient way to snap his spine.{/n} "And now the beasts have returned to become meat for my amusement. Glorious."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

traits.locale_text: {n}Winterscale examines him as if thinking of the most efficient way to snap his spine.{/n} "And now the beasts have returned to become meat for my amusement. Glorious."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: {n}Winterscale lo escudriña como si estuviese ideando el modo más eficaz de partirle el espinazo.{/n} «Y ahora las bestias vuelven para convertirse en carnaza para mi divertimento. Tiene gracia».
languages.original_text: {n}Winterscale examines him as if thinking of the most efficient way to snap his spine.{/n} "And now the beasts have returned to become meat for my amusement. Glorious."

traits.locale_text: {n}Winterscale escudriña al flaco xenos como si estuviese ideando el modo más eficaz de partirle el espinazo.{/n} «Y ahora los pseudohumanos vuelven para convertirse en carne de cañón para mi divertimento. Tiene gracia».
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: {n}温特斯凯尔仔细打量着他，似乎在思考如何以最有效的方式折断他的脊柱。{/n}“而如今，那些畜生又回到了这里，成为供我取乐的猎物。这可真是太棒了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Winterscale examines him as if thinking of the most efficient way to snap his spine.{/n} "And now the beasts have returned to become meat for my amusement. Glorious."

traits.locale_text: {n}温特斯凯尔仔细打量着瘦削的异形，似乎在思考如何以高效的方式折断他的脊柱。{/n}“而如今，那些异形又回到了这里，成为了我的玩物。这可真是有趣。”
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: {n}Winterscale regarde fixement le xénos, comme s'il réfléchissait à la meilleure manière de lui tordre le cou.{/n} « Et maintenant, voilà que les bêtes reviennent pour me servir de proies et de divertissement. Magnifique.»
languages.original_text: {n}Winterscale examines him as if thinking of the most efficient way to snap his spine.{/n} "And now the beasts have returned to become meat for my amusement. Glorious."

traits.locale_text: {n}Winterscale regarde fixement le xénos, comme s'il réfléchissait à la meilleure manière de lui tordre le cou.{{/n} « Et maintenant, voilà que les bêtes reviennent pour me servir de proies et de divertissement. Magnifique.»
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: {n}ウィンタースケールは、その背骨を効率よくへし折る方法を考えるかのように、彼を値踏みする。{/n}「そして今、獣たちが俺の娯楽の血肉となるためにここに戻ってきた。何と素晴らしいことか」
languages.original_text: {n}Winterscale examines him as if thinking of the most efficient way to snap his spine.{/n} "And now the beasts have returned to become meat for my amusement. Glorious."

traits.locale_text: {n}ウィンタースケールは、その背骨を効率よくへし折る方法を考えるかのように、彼を値踏みする。{/n}「そして今、獣たちが俺の娯楽の血肉となるためにここに戻ってきた。何と素晴らしいことか」
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: {n}Winterzunder untersucht ihn, als würde er einen möglichst effizienten Weg suchen, ihm das Rückgrat zu brechen.{/n} "Und nun sind die Bestien zurückgekehrt, um mich zu amüsieren. Herrlich."
languages.original_text: {n}Winterscale examines him as if thinking of the most efficient way to snap his spine.{/n} "And now the beasts have returned to become meat for my amusement. Glorious."

traits.locale_text: {n}Winterzunder mustert den dürren Xenos, als würde er überlegen, wie er dessen Rückgrat effizienter entzweibrechen kann.{/n} "Und nun kommen die Abhumanen wieder hierher zurück, nur um als Futter für meine Unterhaltung zu dienen. Wie amüsant."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: {n}Winterscale, âdeta omurgasını kırmanın en verimli yolunu düşünürcesine Marazhai'ı inceliyor.{/n} "Şimdi de yaratıklar, benim eğlenceme et kaynağı olmak için geri dönmüşler. Muhteşem."
languages.original_text: {n}Winterscale examines him as if thinking of the most efficient way to snap his spine.{/n} "And now the beasts have returned to become meat for my amusement. Glorious."
